4.8.1.title: Essential Well Control Formulas
4.8.1.content:
**HYDROSTATIC PRESSURE**
```
HP (psi) = MW (ppg) × 0.052 × TVD (ft)
```

**EQUIVALENT MUD WEIGHT**
```
EMW (ppg) = Pressure (psi) ÷ 0.052 ÷ TVD (ft)
```

**KILL WEIGHT MUD**
```
KWM = Current MW + (SIDPP ÷ 0.052 ÷ TVD)
```

**INITIAL CIRCULATING PRESSURE**
```
ICP = SCR + SIDPP
```

**FINAL CIRCULATING PRESSURE**
```
FCP = SCR × (KWM ÷ Current MW)
```

**MAASP**
```
MAASP = (Frac Gradient EMW - MW) × 0.052 × Shoe TVD
```

**FORMATION PRESSURE**
```
FP = SIDPP + (MW × 0.052 × TVD)
```

4.8.2.title: Volume Formulas
4.8.2.content:
**PIPE CAPACITY**
```
Capacity (bbl/ft) = ID² ÷ 1029.4
```

**ANNULAR CAPACITY**
```
Capacity (bbl/ft) = (Hole ID² - Pipe OD²) ÷ 1029.4
```

**PIPE DISPLACEMENT (metal)**
```
Displacement (bbl/ft) = (OD² - ID²) ÷ 1029.4
```

**STROKES**
```
Strokes = Volume (bbl) ÷ Pump Output (bbl/stk)
```

4.8.3.title: Influx Analysis Formulas
4.8.3.content:
**INFLUX HEIGHT**
```
Height (ft) = Pit Gain (bbl) ÷ Annular Capacity (bbl/ft)
```

**INFLUX GRADIENT**
```
Gradient = MW Gradient - [(SICP - SIDPP) ÷ Influx Height]
```

**PRESSURE INCREASE FROM MIGRATION**
```
ΔP/hr = Migration Rate (ft/hr) × MW Gradient (psi/ft)
```

4.8.4.title: Barite Calculations
4.8.4.content:
**BARITE TO WEIGHT UP**
```
Barite (sacks) = [ΔMW × Volume × 14.9] ÷ [35.4 - Initial MW]
```

**VOLUME INCREASE FROM WEIGHTING**
```
ΔVolume (bbl) = [Barite (sacks) × 100 lb] ÷ [35.4 × 350]
```

**Note:** 35.4 ppg is barite density, 100 lb per sack standard
